message.raw:
Expand environment variables in labconfig using configparser.BasicInterpolation.
Requires using the backport of configparser for Python 2. Replaced all instances
of SafeConfigParser class as it has been renamed to ConfigParser.

Example usage in labconfig on Windows:
  [programs]
  text_editor = %PROGRAMFILES%\Sublime Text 3\sublime_text.exe
  text_editor_arguments = {file}
  hdf5_viewer = %LOCALAPPDATA%\HDF_Group\HDFView\3.1.0\hdfview.bat
  hdf5_viewer_arguments = {file}
